traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: The goose’s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast the following spells (spell save DC 15), requiring no material or somatic components: * At will: arcane lock, shatter, fear, thunderous smite, wrathful smite * 1/day each: divine word, etherealness, power word stun

traits.name: Evasive
traits.desc: When the goose is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

traits.name: Nimble Escape
traits.desc: The goose can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The goose uses its Honk, then makes three attacks with its Beak.

actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) psychic damage.

actions.name: Honk
actions.desc: All creatures of the goose's choice within 120 ft. that can hear it must make a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw. On a fail, the creature is enraged, having disadvantage on attacks against any target other than the goose until the end of the goose's next turn.
